Moss


Brocade Moss
A soft, feathery moss that forms lush mats.
When illuminated, its overlapping branches create a rippling texture.


Brocade Moss spreading across decaying log
Moss close-up with small fungi.
Rust-brown sporophyte stalks with brown capsules that release spores.


Brocade Moss with Pear-shaped Puffball
Kicker
Brocade moss shares the base of a live white oak trunk with small puffballs.
